snippet: Visa removed Global Payments, an Atlanta company that helps the payment giant process transactions for merchants, from its list of “compliant service providers.”
abstract: Visa removes Global Payments, Atlanta company that helps the payment firm process transactions for merchants, from its list of 'compliant service providers'; security breach at company was thought to have compromised up to three million credit card accounts.
lead_paragraph: Visa removed Global Payments, an Atlanta company that helps the payment giant process transactions for merchants, from its list of “compliant service providers.”

headline.seo: After Data Breach, Visa Removes a Service Provider
headline.main: After a Data Breach, Visa Removes a Service Provider
headline.print_headline: After a Data Breach, Visa Removes a Service Provider
